title: John Loves Mary [1949 - USA] (Ronald Reagan) comedy
description:
John Loves Mary (1949 - USA)

Comedy

starring . . . . Ronald Reagan, Jack Carson, Wayne Morris, Patricia Neal
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0041526/


After World War II, soldier John Lawrence can finally return home and marry his waiting girlfriend, Mary McKinley. But Lawrence is already married. As a favour to his friend, Fred Taylor, who saved his life during the war, Lawrence wed Taylor's English fling, Lilly Herbish, to circumvent immigration laws and to ultimately reunite the two. But there is another problem. Having been home for two years, Taylor is also already married.


Video: XviD, 640x480, 23.976 fps, 1844 Kbps, 01h36m27s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
